content: st *v-st in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next 2 sts skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * around skip last 2 sts join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 72 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps note in this and all rounds you wish to change yarn colors join new color with a slip_stitch one stitch to the left of the slip_stitch you just completed which joined the last round together and then you finished off update as you start a new color of yarn work the round in back loops throughout the round after this initial yarn color change work the rounds using both loops until you change yarn colors again round 6 using color a join with a slip st one stitch to the left of the slip st that you just completed when you joined the last round together working in back loops throughout the round chain 3 double_crochet in bl of next st *shell in next chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 2 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in bl of next 2 sts repeat from * around skip last 2 sts join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 96 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps round 7 slip st into next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 sts *shell in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next 3 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * around skip last 2 sts join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 120 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps round 8 slip st into next st chain 3 double_crochet in the next 3 sts *v-st in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next 4 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from * around skip last 2 sts join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 120 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps round 9 slip st into next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 3 sts *shell in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next 4 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from * around skip last 2 sts join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 144 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps round 10 slip st into next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 4 sts *shell in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts repeat from * around skip last 2 sts join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 168 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps pattern continues repeating rounds as pattern established always working 1 round with v-st and 2 rounds with a shell continue repeating rounds 8 9 and then 10 this will allow your blanket to lay smoother and not increase so quickly the number of double_crochet will increase on each round as you work stitches in the chain-2 spaces created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfoxlover@yahoo com ©2009 this pattern has been tested please notify me of
